title: Grozing Pliers
description: After drafting, increase or decrease the value of the drafted die by 1

title: Eglomise Brush
description: Move any one die in your window ignoring the color restrictions. You must obey the other placement restrictions

title: Copper Foil Burnisher
description: Move any one die in your window ignoring the shade restrictions. You must obey the other placement restrictions

title: Lathekin
description: move exactly two dices, obeying all placement restrictions

title: Lens Cutter
description: After drafting, swap the drafted die wit a die from the Round Track

title: Flux Brush
description: After drafting, re-roll the drafted die. If it cannot be placed. return it to the Draft Pool

title: Glazing Hammer
description: Re-roll all dice in Draft Pool. This may only be used on your second turn before drafting

title: Running Pliers
description: After your first turn, immediately draft a die. Skip your next turn this round

title: Corkbacked Straightedge
description: After drafting, place the die in a spot that is not adjacent to another die. You must obey all other placement restrictions

title: Grinding Stone
description: After drafting, flip the die to its opposite side

title: Flux Remover
description: After drafting, return the die to the Dice Bag and pull one die from the bag. Choose a value and place the new die, obeying all placement restrictions, or return it to the Draft Pool

title: Tap Wheel
description: Move up to two dice of the same color that match the color of a die on the Round Track. You must obey all placement restrictions

title: Strip Cutter
description: take one dice from any other player, give them a dice of matching colour and value, they may place it ignoring the restriction it may be only used before round 7
